T02bsu038_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam - ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājāvasathe viharati sma sārddhaṃ sārdhadvādaśaśatabhikṣūṇāṃ mahāsaṅghena bahubhiśca
T02bsu038_u:4: tasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājamavocat - nāgādhipate, caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu038_u:10: nāgādhipate, eteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu038_u:12: āttamanaso bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
